span.p: Summer Adventure Camp for Oakwood and Westwood students will run from June 10th through August 7th.Â Weekly themes will include science projects, arts and crafts, cooking, group games, water play, weekly field trips, and much more.Â Look for Summer Adventure Camp enrollment information in early March.Â Online registration will begin March 9th.Â

a.title: Click to read more about: Summer Adventure Program - Camp Information
